title: New York’s Hottest Club Is … the Bar at Penn Station?
description: With weekly D.J.s and decent cocktails, the train station watering hole is attracting drinkers with no intentions of traveling.
dc:creator: Becky Hughes
category: The Bar at Moynihan (Manhattan, NY, Bar)
Moynihan Train Hall at Pennsylvania Station (Manhattan, NY)
media:credit: Lanna Apisukh for The New York Times
media:description: The Bar at the new Moynihan Train Hall attracts drinkers from all sorts, many without a train to catch.
